Desc.eng: What are doing here, soldier? Leave that "one-man army" business to the professionals.
I wouldn't dream of it, my lady. I'm a survivor, not a hero. I lost my comrades in the hall behind this door. Harker has strong forces down there. I was lucky to get out alive.
No, we are lucky to have you, soldier. Join one of the Resistance groups and let me deal with Harker's boys.
